CREATE USER RESTTP IDENTIFIED BY oracle DEFAULT TABLESPACE
users QUOTA UNLIMITED ON users;

-- Affectation des privilÃ¨ges a RESTSCOTT

GRANT CREATE SESSION, CREATE TABLE, CREATE PROCEDURE,
CREATE VIEW, CREATE SEQUENCE, CREATE TRIGGER,
COMMENT ANY TABLE TO RESTTP;

grant dba to RESTTP;

-- Creer la connection resttp

-- Generated by Oracle SQL Developer Data Modeler 22.2.0.165.1149
--   at:        2023-05-08 10:38:34 EDT
--   site:      Oracle Database 11g
--   type:      Oracle Database 11g



-- predefined type, no DDL - MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY

-- predefined type, no DDL - XMLTYPE

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id   VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    name        VARCHAR2(50),
    email       VARCHAR2(100) 
--  ERROR: VARCHAR2 size not specified 
     NOT NULL,
    code_postal VARCHAR2(7) NOT NULL,
    pin         INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE clients ADD CONSTRAINT clients_pk PRIMARY KEY ( client_id );

CREATE TABLE order_items (
    order_items_id  VARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL,
    quantity        INTEGER NOT NULL,
    orders_order_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    shoes_shoe_id   VARCHAR2(10)
);

ALTER TABLE order_items ADD CONSTRAINT order_items_pk PRIMARY KEY ( order_items_id );

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id          VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    "date"            DATE NOT NULL,
    clients_client_id VARCHAR2(50)
);

ALTER TABLE orders ADD CONSTRAINT orders_pk PRIMARY KEY ( order_id );

CREATE TABLE shoes (
    shoe_id VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL,
    name    VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    gender  NUMBER CHECK (gender IN (0, 1)) NOT NULL,
    "size"  NUMBER(3, 1) NOT NULL,
    stock   INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price   NUMBER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE shoes ADD CONSTRAINT shoes_pk PRIMARY KEY ( shoe_id );

ALTER TABLE order_items
    ADD CONSTRAINT order_items_orders_fk FOREIGN KEY ( orders_order_id )
        REFERENCES orders ( order_id );

ALTER TABLE order_items
    ADD CONSTRAINT order_items_shoes_fk FOREIGN KEY ( shoes_shoe_id )
        REFERENCES shoes ( shoe_id );

ALTER TABLE orders
    ADD CONSTRAINT orders_clients_fk FOREIGN KEY ( clients_client_id )
        REFERENCES clients ( client_id );

BEGIN
  ORDS.enable_schema(
    p_enabled             => TRUE,
    p_schema              => 'RESTTP',
    p_url_mapping_type    => 'BASE_PATH',
    p_url_mapping_pattern => 'resttp',
    p_auto_rest_auth      => FALSE
  );
    
  COMMIT;
END;
/


-- activation of the table clients for REST access
BEGIN
  ORDS.enable_object (
    p_enabled      => TRUE,
    p_schema       => 'RESTTP',
    p_object       => 'CLIENTS',
    p_object_type  => 'TABLE',
    p_object_alias => 'clients'
  );
    
  COMMIT;
END;
/

    p_object_type  => 'TABLE',
    p_object_alias => 'order_items'
  );
    
  COMMIT;
END;

    p_object_type  => 'TABLE',

  );
    
  COMMIT;
